price: Jedhi "isin Yaa warra yahuudomtan! Namni biraa odoo hafuu isin qofatu jaalalloo Rabbiiti kan jettan yoo taataniif, yoo nama dhugaa dubbatu taataniif du'a hawwaa".
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوٓاْ إِن زَعَمۡتُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ لِلَّهِ مِن دُونِ ٱلنَّاسِ فَتَمَنَّوُاْ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul yāayyuhā alladhīna hādū in zaʿamtum annakum awliyāu lillahi min dūni al-nāsi fatamannawū al-mawta in kuntum ṣādiqīna
